oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hādhihi qaṣīdah jāmiʻah li-ghālib aḥwāl yawm al-qiyāmah wa-ismuhā Qilādat al-durr al-manthūr fī dhikr al-baʻth wa-al-nushūr : manuscript, undated
Qilādat al-durr al-manthūr fī dhikr al-baʻth wa-al-nushūr
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dīrīnī, ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz , 1215-approximately 1295

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Paginated 1-5 in pencil in Arabic numerals.
Copied in the hand of Muḥammad ibn al-Q.r.m.shī.
From the books of ʻAbd al-Salām ibn al-Shaykh [ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Shaṭṭī].
Followed by a poem by Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Luṭf in praise of Muḥammad Bīk, ḥākim of al-Quds al-Sharīf.
MS Arab 337. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Islamic eschatology
